name: Pikachu

ability.name: Lightning Rod
ability.effect: Whenever you discard an Energy attached to 1 of your other Pokemon, flip a coin. If heads, attached it to Pikachu instead.

attacks.name: Volt Tackle
attacks.effect: You may discard 3 Energies attached to Pikachu. If you don't, move 2 Energies from Pikachu and Pikachu does 40 damage to itself.

flavor: There are power plants that run on rooms full of hamster wheels running with these charged rodents.
